column5: FREE | Product Development Help Desk | Eric Chan (VIRTUAL)
column13:
Novatio is a hybrid longevity and preventive health platform that combines (1) quick, low-friction offline screenings (e.g., arterial stiffness/PWV + ABI, body composition/metabolic markers, ultrasound screening partners), with (2) an AI coach that translates those measurements plus wearable data (HRV, sleep, stress rhythm) into a simple “Organ Age” dashboard and an individualized plan.

Our unique value is closing the loop between diagnostics and action: users receive a personalized protocol (nutrition, training, recovery rituals, and supplement stacks), ongoing monitoring with week-by-week adjustments, and a repeatable re-test pathway. We focus on cardiovascular and metabolic risk reduction as the “core engine,” then extend into brain/stress and recovery modules. The experience is designed for mainstream consumers: fast, explainable, and measurable—without requiring a full clinic workflow.
column19:
Sadulla - student/NYUSH/neuroscience/2027
Muzaffar - no affiliation with NYU
column22:
Our main product development challenges are:

1. To find Neurobiology and/or NeuroCardiology experts for creating next level biohacking protocols. 

2. Clinical-grade interpretation without overclaiming: building an explainable model that is conservative, compliant, and useful—especially around “organ age” and risk messaging.

3. Regulatory + go-to-market alignment: designing the UX, disclaimers, and product boundaries so we can scale distribution while staying within appropriate wellness/medical frameworks.
column29:
2. How should we position against wearables-only and lab-testing-only competitors—what messaging and wedge is most compelling for US entry?

Efficient user testing, road map and Funding strategies
column31: “Pre-launch. Our app is on appstore - novatio.”
column32:
1. Function Health / InsideTracker (biomarker-driven health insights)
2. Whoop / Oura / Ultrahuman (wearable-driven recovery and readiness insights)
3. Longevity clinics / biohacking centers (high-touch services, premium pricing)

How we’re differentiated

Hybrid model, not “lab-only” or “wearable-only”: we combine fast offline screenings + wearables + biomarkers into one longitudinal profile.

Action engine + repeat testing: we don’t stop at “insights”—we generate structured protocols and optimize them against measurable outcomes (PWV, HRV, morning BP, sleep quality, metabolic markers).

Affordable + scalable distribution: we aim to deliver screening and onboarding via pharmacies/retail wellness corners and partner locations, not only high-end clinics.

Explainable personalization: our recommendations are tied to a clear mechanvism and a measurable metric (e.g., arterial stiffness phenotype → interventions → expected PWV delta over 8–12 weeks).
